Message.Title: WHY DOES IT TAKE SO LONG (if ever) FOR YAHOO TO DELETE REPORTED SERIAL SPAM?
Message.Msg: They are really quick at deleting posts that criticize Yahoo . . . but reported serial spam messages with URL's designed to steal from Yahoo users can remain for days.

Message.Title: Mayer knows a ton from being a key Google employee
Message.Msg: The secret algrorithms, what makes money and what doesn't. For better or worse, Yahoo is a major destination for people - if she can rework the experience where people do their searches at Yahoo - then major upside coming down the road.

Topic.Title: Mayer will end the Microsoft search agreement

Message.Msg: I hope you are right. It's what she should do whether it is rough to do or not at first. Search is the foundation for the entire Google empire and provides it with for all of its financial leverage. Yahoo, under Marissa, can and should end the agreement with MS. No one thinks of MS as a search vehicle. It was a bad move for MS. Yahoo and Google are known for search. Bing? What in the hell is that? It's not good for MS and its not good for Yahoo. Search is good for Yahoo. Go Marissa.
